message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Consider the decreasing value of the money - a deal now is better than risking a smaller gain later.
I appreciate your concern for fairness, Alice. How about a more balanced 45/55 split instead?
Bob, this is a negotiation, and I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle. I propose 58/42 - it's a good deal considering the money will be worth even less tomorrow.
